item.title: CVE-2023-25989|2024-08-02T14:48:57.427Z -- meks -- meks%20video%20importer
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Meks Video Importer, Meks Time Ago, Meks ThemeForest Smart Widget, Meks Smart Author Widget, Meks Audio Player, Meks Easy Maps, Meks Easy Photo Feed Widget, Meks Simple Flickr Widget, Meks Easy Ads Widget, Meks Smart Social Widget plugins leading toÂ dismiss or the popup.

item.title: CVE-2024-37548|2024-08-02T03:57:39.759Z -- meks -- meks%20easy%20ads%20widget
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Meks Meks Easy Ads Widget allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Meks Easy Ads Widget: from n/a through 2.0.8.
